@RequestMapping(path = "/login")  
public String login(String uname, HttpSession httpSession) {  
    httpSession.setAttribute("name", uname);  
    return "æ¬¢è¿ç™»å½•ï¼š" + uname;

public String get(String uname, HttpSession httpSession) {

}
